verbose_text: Based on vesicle cosedimentation assays, interaction of the Rvs161/167 BAR domain with vesicles was strongly enhanced by PI (4,5) P 2, whereas the membrane binding of Bzz1 F-BAR domain was not augmented by high PI (4,5) P 2 density of the membranes, and the membrane binding of the Syp1 F-BAR domain was slightly inhibited at high (> 8%) PI (4,5) P 2 density (XREF_FIG).
evidence: membrane-binding of Bzz1 F-BAR domain was not augmented by high PI
